entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
